alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued August 17 at 2:50AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE BEAUMONT POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR BRAYLON HARRIS, BLACK, MALE, 2 YEARS OLD, 2 FEET 11 INCHES TALL, 36 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING WITH HAIR IN SHORT BRAIDS. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR GEORGIANN RANDALL, 29 YEARS OLD, BLACK, FEMALE, 5 FEET 7 INCHES TALL, 110 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND UNKNOWN CLOTHING, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GREY SUV BEARING AN UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATE NUMBER. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN BEAUMONT, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE BEAUMONT POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 4 0 9 8 8 0 3 8 6 5. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS BEAUMONT POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 4 0 9 4 9 9 5 7 5 3.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler
